samples.current_output: Apply: Tahsildar office or eservices.tn.gov.in. Documents: Death certificate, Ration card, ID proofs of all heirs, Affidavit. Field verification nadakkum. Time: 15-30 days. Fee: Rs.50. Bank account, pension, insurance claim-kku avasiyam.

samples.instruction: Bill illaama vaangina product-kku complaint podalaamaa?
samples.current_output: Bill illaatalum complaint podalam. Alternative proofs: 1) Bank/card statement, 2) Online payment screenshot, 3) Warranty card, 4) Packaging with shop name, 5) Witness statement. Aanaal bill irundhaal case strong aagum.

samples.instruction: Company en data misuse pannuthu - complaint enge?
samples.current_output: DPDP Act 2023 (implementation started): Data Protection Board-kku complaint. Current options: 1) Company grievance officer, 2) IT Ministry, 3) Consumer forum (service deficiency), 4) Court. Data breach notification: Company inform seyyanum. Consent withdrawal right undu.

Apply: RTO office (not online). Documents: Valid Indian DL, passport, visa, photos. Fee: Rs.1,000. Validity: 1 year or Indian DL validity - edhu koraivo adhu. IDP alone not valid - Indian DL-udan carry pannanum.

Fixed formula illa. Consider: 1) Husband income, 2) Wife income/earning capacity, 3) Standard of living, 4) Children custody, 5) Liabilities. Rough guide: Husband income-in 25-30%. Interim maintenance: 20-25%. Court discretion based on facts.

Aama. DV Act-in keezh 'respondent' includes husband + his relatives who abuse. 498A IPC-in keezh husband and relatives against criminal case podalam. Aanaal specific allegations + evidence venum - general accusation not enough.

Unique farmer ID for TN government schemes. Registration: Primary Agricultural Cooperative Bank à®…à®²à¯à®²à®¤à¯ eservices.tn.gov.in. Benefits: Crop insurance, subsidies, PM-KISAN, crop loan eligibility. Required documents: Patta, Chitta, Aadhaar, Bank account.

Varies: Junior lawyer - Rs.5,000-25,000 per case, Senior - Rs.50,000-5 lakhs+, Supreme Court - Rs.2 lakhs+. Fee agreement writing-la vaangunga. Excessive fee: Bar Council complaint. Free legal aid: DLSA (income <Rs.3 lakh). Legal fee insurance available.

samples.instruction: Lok Adalat-la enna cases settle aagum?
samples.current_output: Cases: Motor accident claims, labour disputes, matrimonial (except divorce), electricity bills, telephone bills, cheque bounce, bank loan recovery, compoundable criminal offences. Benefits: No court fee, no appeal, quick settlement. Permanent Lok Adalat: Public utility services.

Steps: 1) Tribunal application (Collector office), 2) Prove neglect/ill-treatment, 3) Order for property return. Time limit: None specified - apply anytime. Evidence: Witnesses, medical records (if abuse), communication records. Preventive: Transfer with life interest retention safer.

Immediate: 1) Password change (all linked accounts), 2) Enable 2FA, 3) Check login history, 4) Bank accounts verify, 5) Linked devices remove. If money lost: 1930 + bank + cybercrime.gov.in. Recovery email/phone verify pannunga.

samples.instruction: Rent Authority order-kku edhiraga appeal seyyalaamaa?
samples.current_output: Aama. Rent Authority order-kku edhiraga Rent Court (District Court)-la 30 days-kkul appeal seyyalam. Rent Court order-kku edhiraga High Court-la appeal seyyalam. Vazhakkamana civil procedure follow aagum.

samples.instruction: Online child abuse report eppadi seivathu?
samples.current_output: Report: 1) cybercrime.gov.in (select child-related crime), 2) NCPCR helpline: 1098, 3) Police. POCSO Act: Strict punishment for child exploitation. Platforms: Report + block. Evidence preserve pannunga. Don't forward content - possess panradhe illegal.

samples.instruction: Online-la order pannen, vera product vandhudutchu (Coimbatore style)
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) Delivery podhu video edunga (unboxing), 2) App-la return/refund request, 3) Email complaint (company grievance officer), 4) NCH portal complaint. Evidence upload pannunga. 7 days-la response illanna consumer forum.

samples.instruction: PAN card-la mistake irukku - correct panradhu eppadi?
samples.current_output: Online: tin-nsdl.com or onlineservices.nsdl.com. Form: Correction form + supporting documents. Fee: Rs.110 (Indian address) / Rs.1,020 (foreign). Documents: ID proof, address proof with correct details. Time: 15-20 days. Status track: UTI/NSDL websites.

samples.instruction: Kaaranam sollaama job-la irundhu remove pannitaanga
samples.current_output: Wrongful termination: 1) Written explanation demand, 2) Labour Commissioner, 3) Labour Court/Industrial Tribunal. Remedies: Reinstatement, back wages, compensation. Standing Orders: Company rules check pannunga. Workmen vs Manager: Different procedures apply.

Will writing: Clear language, all properties list, beneficiaries name, date, signature, 2 witnesses signature. Registration kattaayam illa but recommended - disputes avoid. Registered will Sub-Registrar office-la safe custody-la irukum.
